entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Nordegg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
